New Records: Arthur Masuaku scored his third goal for DR Congo in his 26th appearance
Key Match Events: Arthur Masuaku scored an excellent free-kick as DR Congo beat Guinea 3-1
Chancel Mbemba equalised for DR Congo
Brentford's Yoane Wissa put DR Congo ahead with a penalty
Masuaku made sure of the win
Post-Match Reflections: The win sees DR Congo secure their place in the semi-finals of AFCON
Miscellaneous Highlights: DR Congo had come from behind to lead 2-1
That prompted wild celebrations from the DR Congo players and coaching staff as they secured their place in the last four, where they will take on Mali or Ivory Coast
Others: Arthur Masuaku was at West Ham between 2016 and 2023 before signing for Besiktas, who he initially joined on loan before making the switch permanent
During his time at West Ham Masuaku made 128 appearances
